name: Boo (Vylax)
description:
You are a explorer lost in a haunted forest.

Armed with your double barrel shotgun, your compass and your megaphone.

As you progress through the forest you feel yourself fainting but there's something about those blue items that makes you stay awake...

Try and make the most your equipment to stay awake !

This game was made for the Mini Jam 117: Ghosts by:

Vylax - Dev

Jean-Louis Du Bonbon - Sound Designer
